attributes.action: Stop protests that create huge disruption with immediate effect
attributes.additional_details:
Throughout the UK we have experienced a large amount of protests by groups such as Insulate Britain, JustStopOil & XRebelion. 
This brings our country to it's knees, many people have to stop work, companies are taking a hit on income, children can't get to school, the sick can't get ambulances and the disruption caused is not necessary. 

Any protest that causes significant disruption or annoyance should allow the Police to apply force to stop them. 

Peaceful, not disruptive protests only!
attributes.background:
Laws need to be put in place to stop protest by groups such as Insulate Britain, JustStopOil & XRebelion that cause significant disruption to the UK. 
Force should be used by Police to stop these protests.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Review powers for tackling obstructive protesters and their organisers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600994
